text: Yadi kona nari sbiya sbamira paksa theke asadacarana kimba upeksara asanka kare, tabe paraspara kona mimansa kare nile tadera ubhayera kona gonaha na'i. Mimansa uttama. Manera samane lobha bidyamana ache. Yadi tomara uttama kaja kara ebam khodabhiru ha'o, tabe, allaha tomadera saba kajera khabara rakhena.
